name: messageai-lambda-functions
description: AWS Lambda functions for MessageAI heavy AI processing

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip .
scripts.deploy:search: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name MessageAI-Search --zip-file fileb://function.zip
scripts.deploy:knowledge: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name MessageAI-KnowledgeBuilder --zip-file fileb://function.zip
scripts.deploy:assistant: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name MessageAI-Assistant --zip-file fileb://function.zip
